com.acmetelecom

Interface IPeakPeriod

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaytimePeakPeriod

    public interface IPeakPeriod
    Defines the interface for a class describing a peak period.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod
      Defines the periods in a day.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPeakEnd()
      Gets the hour of the peak end time.
      int getPeakStart()
      Gets the hour of the peak start time.
      int getPeriodDurationSeconds(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period)
      Gets the duration of a specified period in seconds.
      IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod getPeriodOfDay(org.joda.time.DateTime time)
      Gets the DayPeriod associated with a specific time in the day.
      java.math.BigDecimal getPeriodRate(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period, com.acmetelecom.customer.Tariff tariff)
      Gets the pricing rate for a specific tariff and a specific period of the day.
      int getSecondInDayAtEndOfPeriod(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period)
      Gets the time of day (in seconds) at the end of a specified period.

    • Method Detail

      • getPeakEnd

        int getPeakEnd()
        Gets the hour of the peak end time.
        Returns:
        The hour when the peak period ends.

      • getPeakStart

        int getPeakStart()
        Gets the hour of the peak start time.
        Returns:
        The hour when the peak period starts.

      • getPeriodDurationSeconds

        int getPeriodDurationSeconds(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period)
        Gets the duration of a specified period in seconds.
        Parameters:
        period - The period type to get the duration of.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.

      • getPeriodOfDay

        IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod getPeriodOfDay(org.joda.time.DateTime time)
        Gets the DayPeriod associated with a specific time in the day.
        Parameters:
        time - The time to get the DayPeriod for.
        Returns:
        The DayPeriod associated with the provided time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.

      • getPeriodRate

        java.math.BigDecimal getPeriodRate(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period,
                                 com.acmetelecom.customer.Tariff tariff)
        Gets the pricing rate for a specific tariff and a specific period of the day.
        Parameters:
        period - The period of the day to get the pricing rate for.
        tariff - The tariff to get the pricing rate for.
        Returns:
        The pricing rate as a BigDecimal.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.

        int getSecondInDayAtEndOfPeriod(IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod period)
        Gets the time of day (in seconds) at the end of a specified period.
        Parameters:
        period - The period type to get the time of day for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
